examples.example: 我这次考试虽然有几科成绩不太理想，但我会努力的，争取下次不再考鸭蛋。

translate.english: Although the scores of several subjects in this exam of mine are not very ideal, I will work hard and strive not to get a zero again next time.

examples.example: 我的弟弟很可爱，昨天画了一个鸭蛋形状的图画送给我，让我十分开心。

translate.english: My younger brother is very cute. He drew a picture in the shape of a duck egg for me yesterday, which made me very happy.

examples.example: 我的梦想是养一群鸭子，每天都能收获好多鸭蛋。

translate.english: My dream is to raise a group of ducks and be able to harvest a lot of duck eggs every day.
